entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 10:09 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
